member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.InnerElementReference
member.summary: Exposes a Blazor of the wrapped around HTML element. It can be used e.g. for JS interop, etc.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.ExpandedColor
member.summary: Sets the `style` of the `background-color` when tab is Active. Use HTML specified: **Color Names**, **RGB**, **HEX** or with **HSL** values.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.CollapsedColor
member.summary: Sets the `style` of the `background-color` when tab is not the Active tab. Use HTML specified: **Color Names**, **RGB**, **HEX** or with **HSL** values.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.HoverColor
member.summary: Sets the `style` of the `background-color` when button is hovered over with mouse. Use HTML specified: **Color Names**, **RGB**, **HEX** or with **HSL** values.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.ContentHeight
member.summary: Sets the height of Content panel in `px`. 0 is auto.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.Disabled
member.summary: Determines whether all the rendered HTML elements should be disabled or not.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.OnCollapseChanged
member.summary: Callback function called when panel collapsed or expanded. Collapsed state is the callback parameter.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.AllOtherAttributes
member.summary: Blazor capture for any unmatched HTML attributes.
